// src/About.js import React from 'react'; // Assuming App.css is imported in a higher component (e.g., App.js or index.js) const About = () => { // Replace these details with your company's actual information const teamMembers = [ { name: 'Ethan Hunt', role: 'CEO & Founder', bio: 'Visionary leader driving innovation and strategic growth.' }, { name: 'Sarah Connor', role: 'Chief Technology Officer', bio: 'Expert in scalable architecture and modern development practices.' }, { name: 'Michael Scott', role: 'Head of Customer Success', bio: 'Dedicated to ensuring exceptional user satisfaction and support.' }, ]; const coreValues = [ 'Integrity: We operate with honesty and transparency.', 'Innovation: We constantly seek better and novel solutions.', 'Excellence: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do.', 'Customer Focus: Our users are at the heart of our decisions.', ]; return (

Our Story: [Your Company Name]

We are a dedicated team committed to revolutionizing the industry through technology, creativity, and a passion for people.

üöÄ Our Mission

Our mission is to empower individuals and businesses by providing intuitive, powerful, and affordable digital solutions that help them achieve their maximum potential.

‚ú® Core Values

    {coreValues.map((value, index) => (
  • ‚Äî {value}
    • ))}

üìú Our History

[Your Company Name] was founded in 2020 by Ethan Hunt with the simple goal of [mention founding goal]. Since then, we have grown from a small startup to a global presence, constantly adapting to the evolving needs of the digital world.

ü§ù Meet Our Team

{teamMembers.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

))}

Thank you for being part of our journey. We look forward to building the future with you!

Contact us at: info@[yourcompany].com

); }; export default About;
